content: Do. Or do not. There is no try.
author: Yoda

content: To any entrepreneur: if you want to do it, do it now. If you don’t, you’re going to regret it.
author: Catherine Cook

content: It’s not about ideas. It’s about making ideas happen.
author: Scott Belsky

content: There’s nothing wrong with staying small. You can do big things with a small team.
author: Jason Fried

content: Ideas are easy. Implementation is hard.
author: Guy Kawasaki

content: If you just work on stuff that you like and you’re passionate about, you don’t have to have a master plan with how things will play out.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

content: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
If you’re not a risk taker, you should get the hell out of business.
author: Ray Kroc

content: Always deliver more than expected.
author: Larry Page

content: Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren't used to an environment where excellence is expected.
author: Steve Jobs

content: Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn’t matter to me … Going to bed at night saying we’ve done something wonderful … that’s what matters to me.
author: Steve Jobs

content: Quality is more important than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles.
author: Steve Jobs

content: I want to put a ding in the universe.
author: Steve Jobs

content: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

content: Risk more than others think is safe. Dream more than others think is practical.
author: Howard Schultz

content: I’m convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
author: Steve Jobs

content: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

content: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
author: Richard Branson

content: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

content: Fail often so you can succeed sooner.
author: Tom Kelley

content: Timing, perseverance, and ten years of trying will eventually make you look like an overnight success.
author: Biz Stone

content: I can accept failure. Everyone fails at something. But I cannot accept not trying.
author: Michael Jordan

content: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney
